reviews.text:
This restaurant is extremely busy, and has traditional Portuguese cuisine with affordable prices. At your arrival just give your name and number of people.
We stayed outside with only 1 staff member for all the tablets, he was literally running between tables and at the same time trying to be friendly and attentive.
The food was tasty.
Recommended.

Tasty, simple honest cooking for a good value! It's no wonder this restaurant is so busy. Server Jo√£o took good care of us; moved us to shelter when it started to rain.
üëç grilled sea bass: crispy & nicely seasoned, blanched green beans & potatoes
üëç grilled octopus: very tender

3 recommendations before going to this restaurant :
1. Go early otherwise make a reservation. The place filled up quickly
2. Absolutely order fish , fish and fish
3. I recommend you let the waiter know whether to charge your own country currency or Euro, in our case there is a premium charge our own local currency.

Hope you find this review helpful
Always a top place price/quality, variety of Portuguese cusine dishes, always full (I only go at lunch time).

We were really impressed by this Restaurant. Looks nothing special from the outside nor from its location - but the fact it is packed out every evening with locals prepared to wait for a table tells all you need to know.
Great selection of Meat and Fish dishes and everything we had was of the highest quality, well prepared and truly delicious. Desserts we're excellent too.
Service was very friendly and remarkably fast for a large Restaurant filled to capacity.
I wish I was not a tourist and this restaurant was near enough for me to come back again and again.
Truly excellent and thanks to all the staff that made it possible
